topic: Statement of Academic Department for Internship Leave of Absence
question: I am writing to ask for help getting a statement from the academic department regarding the relevancy of my internship for my leave of absence. The contract is attached. If additional information is needed, please let me know."
answer: You need a statement from the study advising Informatics in order to apply for a leave of absence. Please send the documents stated under 'internships' on the following website via e-mail: https://www.cit.tum.de/en/cit/studies/students/advising/informatics/tips-for-successful-studies/
